increment.valera: %s, your bravery has expanded the realm, the world grows by %s %s in your honor!
increment.tenos: %s, thanks to your courage, the world now stretches %s %s further!
increment.wendarr: %s, in recognition of your efforts, the world expands by %s %s!
increment.idona: %s, your achievements grant you more land, the border grows by %s %s!
decrement.valera: %s, your failure has shrunk the world, the border retracts by %s %s!
decrement.tenos: %s, the realm diminishes by block as a consequence of your defeat %s %s as a consequence of your defeat!
decrement.wendarr: %s, your missteps have cost you dearly the world shrinks by %s %s!
decrement.idona: %s, your setback has taken its toll, the world contracts by %s %s!
